website_summaries.verdict: Not just for kitchens anymore: a premier name in gadgets creates a double-sided tool that cleans laptops effectively and is portable enough to take anywhere.
pros: Soft bristles brush away debris from keyboard and never scratch, while silicone tip gets into the tighter spots
Excellent for cleaning other small electronics, such as cameras and cell phones
About the size of a highlighter
Cap protects the silicone end while the bristles retract
cons: The bristles sometimes get dirt stuck to them, so may want to wash off on occasion
make sure they're totally dry before using again

customer_reviews.title: DetailsThe Hell out Of A MacBook
customer_reviews.text: This item is super cheap and if totally anal about keeping your devices immaculate, this is awesome. I spent a full hour using the silicone tip to dig around all of the keys, brushed that out with the super soft brush, then wiped down with an iKleat single wipe, then buffed it out. Looks great and when feeling extra OCD, will do again and again. Am thinking stocking stuffers for Xmas because who doesn’t have a laptop/ computer? Works great for getting grime out of the home button on the iPhone/ iPad, as well.
customer_reviews.author: linchetto

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these off the bat- one for the office and one for home/my car. As the person who blows compressed air through my keyboard every day at the office, this has made cleaning much less disruptive to the rest of my cube-mates. I don’t use the marker tip often, but it’s good for getting stubborn bits of dust on the side of keys. Keep in mind, it does seem to leave a mark/residue so you always have to use the brush end after
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Electonic Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what all the hype was about this pen. I got it because the reviews were good. Well my laptop is still dirty. Guess I have to use something better and stronger. As I was using it, some of the rubber came off. Thats when I knew this was not going to work. So I quickly put in for a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: trustatry

customer_reviews.title: Works well! And is a quality item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean out my AirPods, and it’s worked really well. The sharp end of the tip is perfect for scraping out the gunk that gets stuck in the cracks. It’s actually pretty nasty what came out of there. I’d definitely recommend this product, it works well. ******************************* I rely heavily on reviews when I make purchases so I put some time into reviewing everything I buy on Amazon for personal or business use so I can help other people considering that item. If you found my review helpful, please consider hitting the "helpful" button below when it asks if the review is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Mike303

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than just electronics
customer_reviews.text: How have I lived without this product??? This is a great tool for cleaning fiddly things—not just electronics, but anything small with crevices (other than kitchen items—but OXO makes another set of brushes for that). The silicone tip is what makes it awesome. I use it to clean dead skin out of my eyeglasses' nose pads without smudging up the lenses. I use it to get cat hairs out of the edges of my laptop's trackpad. Both the brush and the silicone tip make cleaning pernicious dust off tiny knickknacks actually worth attempting. Few OXO products have ever disappointed me, and this is the complete opposite of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend nor buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as expected, tip is too soft as well as brush. It doesn't remove dust from small areas such as your phone's speaker. Wouldn't recommend nor buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this so I could get the hard to reach areas on my figures since. q-tios didnt work so well. I tried to show up close of some dust on one if my mini figures. The brush perfectly cleaned the hard to reach places. The brushes bristles are soft and you can retract it by moving the small white button on uo and down. Didnt try the other end out but sure it works fine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zemhi

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning KeyBoards Is Tedious!
customer_reviews.text: I tend putting off cleaning my keyboard but it is a task that eventually must be done. I bought this to help. It did its job but I had to clean the keyboard the old fashioned way first. I wiped the entire keyboard with a wet cloth and cleaned in between the keys with a Q-Tip. Then I used this to reach the places the Q-Tip couldn't reach. I had to dip the hard part of the cleaning brush into water to get the caked on dirt off but my keyboard is almost as clean as the day I opened the box. It helped but I need to quit putting off cleaning the keyboard as long as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to OXO Good Grips, you can't go wrong. This product is no different. I am the duster end of this little tool because my keyboard is dusty all the time (working from home and keeping the windows open doesn't help). I use a disinfecting wipe and then go over the keyboard with this duster. I also found that keeping my keyboard covered with saran wrap (or something clear just like that. stretch and tape it down) repels dust.So yes, I would absolutely recommend this little tool to dust off you keyboard. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleaning pen!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning pen is great! I bought it for camera lenses, but found it useful cleaning my car dashboard too! Also worked well on a couple watches. The silicone end grabs dirt--amazing. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the $5
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but it's just not really useful at all. I wanted it to clean out all the dust and bits from my laptop. The brush is fine I suppose. It's a brush. The silicone bit is what I really needed. Something to get into those cramped places and dig at any cemented stuff. It's just too thick to get into anything and utterly too soft to be of any use. It's also slightly split at the end so it just spreads over anything you're trying to get. If you want a little brush, then sure. If you want the silicone pointer thing, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Wo0t

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning up nasty Apple AirPod cases
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my increasingly nasty Apple AirPods charging case, and it did the trick. There are a lot of tiny creases, tight spots, and gunk traps under the hindges and this did a really good job with some 409 cleaning solution to break the grime away and bring it back to the clean white case it was designed as. The brush part was great and getting magnetic dust crap away from it, the rubber blade was great for cleaning the cracks. Unfortunately nothing else I own has become as funk ridden as my airpod case so I don't have much else to try it on, but I'm sure it will be great for a lot of applications.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as I had hoped it would be. I am one of the unfortunate people to have purchased a MBP with a butterfly keyboard, and while the super soft brush can gently sweep away stray superficial dust particles without disturbing anything while my laptop is operating, the silicon tip does not attract or remove visible particles between the keys before they get embedded within the top case. It does a so so job on my phone's camera. Overall, it's pretty meh.
customer_reviews.author: 🤗Ovrjoyd🤗

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It is wonderful for removing dirt, lint and crumbs from your keyboard. But after less than a year of light-to-moderate use, the bristles are falling out. Probably half of them are gone now, and the brush is much less effective. I knew it wouldn't last forever, but I expected more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Owl

customer_reviews.title: Multi use brush
customer_reviews.text: The OXO Good Grips Electronics Cleaning Brush is a great retractable brush that is easy to use. I purchased for my sewing machine that gets all kinds of lint in the bobbin case. Works like a charm and is safe for all electronics since it's silicone. Easily grabs dust and lint particles safely.
customer_reviews.author: wearwood

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!  Why didn't I get this before?
customer_reviews.text: My keyboard is a mess because PEOPLE (OK, husband and I) eat and drop crumbs all over it and almost never clean it. A duster doesn't do much good, so I just keep an extra keyboard ready for when the current one breaks down. But this tool is incredible and the wedge tip is a game changer! I am amazed at all the junk it got out. There should be a wall of shame where people can display pictures of all the stuff they extracted. I swear I could have potted a small plant with mine!
customer_reviews.author: whitequeen

customer_reviews.title: Does What it Should Do
customer_reviews.text: Now that I am working from home, I've discovered a new challenge-- keeping cat hair out of my keyboard. This brush does what it should do. I'm now looking at a fur-free keyboard. Just like it was in the olden days when this keyboard lived in my office. When I commuted for hours to sit in an office for hours to commute for hours to return back home. Quite frankly, working from home is already a big plus for me. This $5 gadget just adds to the joy.
customer_reviews.author: CB Mistyridge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all, can't clean grooves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sole purpose of cleaning the grooves in my electronics, for example game controllers, where 'gamer gunk' can build up, I like to keep my stuff clean, however the silicon bit on the end is no where near sturdy enough to be used for this purpose nor does it reach deep enough, putting any pressure on it causes it to flex instead of pushing deeper into a groove. This basically makes the product entirely useless to me and devoids it's reason for existing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fasnacht

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, great idea, handy tool.
customer_reviews.text: Was always getting dust on the keyboard , that even blowing on it or canned air couldn’t always get rid of. This tool does the trick! One side is a contoured blue rubber tool for getting stubborn areas, and the other end is a blue bristled brush that can get in between the keys on your keyboard to clean it. There is a white “switch” on the black rubber barrel that allows you to hide the brush end inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy In NY

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than what I thought it would be. Works great!!! It cleans great!! Im cleaning everything on my desk. Each day since I have gotten it, I just sit at my desk and brush everything clean. The brush is soft and pushes up out of the tube. When done cleaning, it retracks back. The other tip is an angled rubber tip that I clean other areas and areas I could get to. Love it!! Buy it you will love it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Campbell-Skelly

customer_reviews.title: BEST KEYBOARD CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: Yes it would be nice to use an air cleaner, but you waste your money as it runs out. This brush, you can use over and over again! Wow! I did not know my keyboard was that dirty! It found fuss, hair, and more! I just kept brushing it and brushing it, and more kept coming out of the keyboard! For the price, get it, you can use and re-use. AND no one paid me for this review!
customer_reviews.author: Love Dogs 4

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless at getting crud out of crevices. The tips are too soft. A credit card works much better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ohlemeier

customer_reviews.title: A good tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Confession: it's my first ever keyboard brush; I've never really paid much attention to cleaning my keyboard, and it was time. And wow, the amount of fluff that came out from under the keys, very embarrassing. The gadget has two ends, a retractable soft brush that I mostly use, and a foam tip with a protective cover one can use for targeted cleaning. So a good 'investment'.
customer_reviews.author: UA

customer_reviews.title: I now have a clean keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this brush. I plan to order a couple more for work, as the keyboards get filthy there and the canned air doesn't clean the sides of the keys. This little pen does. The brush seems to attract little crumbs (yes, I do snack at me computer) as well as dust. I also use it t clean the fan on my "computer cooler" The little pointed end can get things that are a little too firmly attached for the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Grace E. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Its exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually impressed with this product. I use it to clean my sewing machine. It works better then the hand held vacuum! It seems to "pull" out the dust in the small spaces. It works!
customer_reviews.author: YollyTampa

customer_reviews.title: Stop what you're doing and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on one of the "Most popular items on Amazon" type of lists you see on Facebook. I wanted something to clean my phone and other electronics. I purchased it, and am so glad I did! The price was so reasonable. I highly recommend this. My phone is in a case, but lint, dirt, etc. like to get stuck around my phone inside the case. It took some elbow grease to remove some things, but it's easy to use. I love that the brush side is retractable, and the wiper side has a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.  Oxo FTW-as usual
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much I bought another one to carry around with me in my laptop bag. Love the way this is designed with attention to detail and the retractable feature is awesome. Which means it does what I need it to do and then stays clean between uses. Huge thumbs up. Giving these to a few people for Christmas too.
customer_reviews.author: ninja crepes

customer_reviews.title: keypad cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: It helps to keep the keypad clean. I like to used both ends to achieve this. If you do not have a cover for your keypad this is the tool to have. The brush side did become hard to move in and out and I now keep it in the out position. If you need to keep the keyboard clean and don't have a cover I would like to recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: teach408632

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a really good electronic cleaner. The brush side is very soft. The rubber side is also soft but I haven't used it on anything. I do wish it came with two caps. I know the brush pulls into the pen but I still wish I could cover it to keep the dust out and still protect the rubber end.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t seem to do anything but push debris around. The “eraser” end doesn’t remove anything and the brush moves dust/debris around but rarely picks anything up to get it OUT of the keyboard. I use it to distract myself while on hold with insurance companies so it’s more of a “fidget device” than an electronic cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Cubed

customer_reviews.title: Simple design yet great help!
customer_reviews.text: Every time when I joined an online meeting, I found some dust in between my keyboard caps and I could not do anything to remove them. Now I get this handy tool to keep my favorite keyboard clean and kill time if the meeting is tedious :D
customer_reviews.author: Jeng-Hau

customer_reviews.title: Such A Clever & Handy Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone with OCD likes me needs this. I like to keep everything clean. Even the crevices of my keyboard. This thing definitely does the job of dusting and getting particles from in between your keyboard. I will say that the silicon part takes a little time to work with but if you are patient it will clean. I like the little duster and the cap that it comes with. Very easy to store and take on the go.
customer_reviews.author: B.Kiah

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in Cleaning Computor Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I like the OXO cleaning brush. It is helpful in caring for a computer keyboard .It gets into most of the nooks and crann and digs out unwanted debris. I have found that my keyboard still has sticking keys but that may be a flaw in the design of the keyboard, and not a failure with the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush specificially to clean Macbook keyboards. The black keys do get greasy and are hard to clean. I tested this on my Macbook Pro and so far so good. It gets the grease off and makes the keys nice and dull, as they should be. So far so good. Please note, I was given this product at a discount for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Reusable tool to keep things tidy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I use it whenever I think my keyboard is looking dusty or crummy. The two sides are equally important and do a great job. Definitely get this if you like to keep things tidy or for your neat freak family and friends. I've had it for a few years and it holds up really well.
customer_reviews.author: mcvickie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to do what you need it to do
customer_reviews.text: This is perfectly fine for dusting your computer surfaces, both internal and external. If you need to reach any harder to reach places, however, having something with finer bristles may be your best bet if you're unsure about canned air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Little Dude...
customer_reviews.text: ... is amazing. My house, for whatever reason, gets really dusty - and dust just clings to this thing when I use it for my keyboard and computer vents. I already recommended it to a friend and I would recommend it to anyone. These would honestly make awesome stocking stuffers or something for people who are picky about keeping their computers clean. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs One
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did a pretty good job keeping my electronics clean, boy was I mistaken. Using both ends of this brush has made my keyboard look brand new again and it's 10 years old! Nice little tool that I then used on my TENS unit that is 16 years old. Until I began struggling with adjusting the dials I though it was fairly clean too, wrong, I can now adjust the levels with one finger again. Handy tool everyone should have several around the house for all their electronic gadget or other tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for, which in this case is the ability to clean the nooks and crannies of your laptop and keyboard with easy. No more blowing dust for me - now I just sweep it away with the brush end or drag the solid end around my keyboard keys to clean up stray particles.
customer_reviews.author: Paola V.S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars only because I was hoping for something a bit more effective. Yes, it’s easy to hold, it’s small enough to keep in your desk pen cup. But the tip with which you’re supposed to be able to get into the crevices around the keyboard keys is a bit too smooshy to really dig in. It does work, but not as well as I had hoped it would. For the price, I’m ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: Keep that desk spic and span.
customer_reviews.text: My keyboard was always a mess until I got this little guy. The brush works great for dust (and crumbs - admit it - you snack at your desk too). I like that the brush retracts so it doesn't get misshapen or dusty when not in use. The other end works well on the more stubborn dirt. I have a black keynoard, but I imagine it is even more noticeable on a white or silver one. Glad I invested.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME - ELECTRONICS
customer_reviews.text: THIS LITTLE PEN IS SUPER EASY TO USE - TO GET BETWEEN LAPTOP KEYS. IT WAS EASY TO FIND HOW TO CLEAN THE LAPTOP / CELL PHONE... SCREENS. BUT THIS IS THE 1ST PRODUCT I FOUND THAT MAKES CLEANING (TIGHT SPACES BETWEEN KEYS /GROOVES) SUPER EASY AND FAST. I PURCHASE 2 OF THESE. 1 FOR MYSELF AND ANOTHER FOR MY SISTER. YOU WILL LIKE HOW FAST THIS LITTLE PEN MAKES CLEANING COMPUTER KEYBOARDS SO FAST AND EASY. IT TOOK BE MAYBE 2 MINUTES TO CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN ALLER

customer_reviews.title: cats+computers =need this brush
customer_reviews.text: You can't have cats+computers without this brush. I find an inordinate amount of cat hair in my keyboard and this is the only safe way to get it out. I've used envelopes, papers, etc to move the fur around but that risks damaging the keys--which I've done. This is such a great solution to a problem you didn't even really know you had until now. I've given several as gifts. I'm sure it works equally well for dust, etc. but my problem is cat hair and this takes care of it.
customer_reviews.author: slotravel

customer_reviews.title: Great for detail dusting & cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This tool is great for cleaning electronics and general detail cleaning. The bristle side has ultra soft bristles while the other side allows you to work off dirt that's packed on (e.g. Keyboard keys sometimes get a layer of packed on dirt). I carry this with me in my laptop backpack. It's lightweight, has a protective cap on one end and retractable bristles on the other keeping the brush and cleaning head free of dirt. Fits well in my hand as well for easy control while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Imran

customer_reviews.title: It’s meh
customer_reviews.text: I think the brush portion of this might be a hair too soft. The silicone side is practically useless. But for a quick cleaning it works
customer_reviews.author: Parkercxx12

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I WFH so my laptop as accumulated its fair share of crumbs, dust, and other debris. This was the perfect cleaning tool. The brush side easily sweeps away particles and the rubbery wedge side helps to scrub out gunk in-between keys. Best part is it easily fits into the pen holder on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you this is what I’ve been missing my whole life. I got a new job and obviously a used keyboard and the things that came out of there were DISGUSTING. It LOOKED clean but I figured I’d try and SO MUCH came out. So worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Baxa

customer_reviews.title: great low-tech, inexpensive tool
customer_reviews.text: The OXO Good Grips Electronics Cleaning Brush has two functional cleaning ends. Both are well protected when not in use. The retractable brush is soft enough to clean between the keys without pushing the keys down.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: So Useful
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little brush! I've used it to clean my laptop keyboard, my work keyboard, my work phone, etc. The brush gets all the nooks and crannies, and the silicon end picks up lint. My only complaint is that the handle is coated for comfort but it picks up lint and pet fur and is a little difficult to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Works, but may not be best for you.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, but you continually have to wipe it off. Since using this I have seen products that look just as effective without having to repeatedly clean the "pen". Look around and see if you can find those products. If not, this does what it days, and it is very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Amber

customer_reviews.title: The brush is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush and how it can be slid into the pen for protection. The only gripe I have is that the silicon cleaning tip is way too soft, it needs to be more rigid and less floppy to properly clean out cracks and crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Only ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to clean my tv remotes between the small buttons. it didn't do much good until I sprayed a bit of cleaner into the top surface. Then I scrubbed with this devise. Not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Must have next to blower rocket and cleaning clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it is hard to get in tight areas with a cleaning clothes but this pen makes it easy. More specifically dust on the edges of the viewfinder or between buttons. I'm a bit OCD so I like to clean my equipment when I get back home. There are other applications for it but I mainly use it for my camera and electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not actually as good as described. I would definitely not recommend or buy this again. A dollar store tooth brush would do better. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Levi

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective, wouldn't buy again if I was given the option
customer_reviews.text: It's handier than using a tissue or something, but it doesn't do much more than a tissue. I used the silicone wiper side on the inside edges of my laptop screen, and it worked pretty well, picked up a bit of dust and whatnot. Used the brush side on my keyboard, but it seemed to me that it knocked more stuff UNDER the keys instead of off them. You could basically accomplish the same thing with a piece of Kleenex.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parks

customer_reviews.title: Well made, though my issue is the bristles are not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Steelseries gaming keyboard with tallish keys. I wish the bristles on the brush were a quarter inch longer. Otherwise it's a great product - just not great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morse

customer_reviews.title: Nice practical tool for electronics
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lightly dust lint spots off my laptop screen and keyboard, and the silicone chisel tip to wipe off smudges. I've also used the tip in temporary place of my usual spudger tool when I'm doing some light work on circuit boards and am too focused to get it out of the drawer; since it's soft, it won't give too much force, but it works in a pinch. For the price, this is a neat little tool you didn't realize you needed until you own one.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Used it once.
customer_reviews.text: I have NO clue why I bought this. I literally own the dusting spray but apparently I thought that wasn’t good enough. Maybe I can find another use, but I have seemed to misplace this already, sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Nice little asset and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, handy tool for computer and cameras which is what we bought it for. Being the OXO brand, I didn't doubt it would be good quality and easy to use. We have a lot of their kitchen tools and have never been disappointed. The tool has helped my husband greatly in keeping out the dirt for the keyboard. And I have a camera that the lens seems to get stuck on. I guess a piece of grit gets in there. The brush is smooth and easy to get between the keys on the keyboard. Great price for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Removes hair, fabric fibers and apparently, DNA as well.
customer_reviews.text: On my latest serial killing spree I found myself with the urge to check my Facebook account. I unwittingly used my last victim's laptop, without thinking. Luckily, right before I left my latest blood splattered crime scene, I recalled having bought this handy OXO Good Grips Electronics Cleaning Brush, just a day prior. I used it to clean the aforementioned victim's laptop keyboard, and I slept easy knowing my DNA was not a clue the FBI would be including in their profile. As I have yet to be apprehended I can attest to it's handiness. P.S. Seriously: this thing does clean my keyboard better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Trash product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t clean any of my electronics and actually made several of my electronics worse as the blue rubber rubbed off inside my electronics. You get what you pay for. AVOID!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Davis

customer_reviews.title: This will get it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get stuff up out of there. It does a good job of getting up in there. The pointy side helps for stuff that’s really up in there. Nuff said
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clearing Cheeto dust
customer_reviews.text: The brush is perfect for clearing all types of crumbs and dust. Easy to wash with dish soap. The wedge point is also very handy for cleaning all sorts of teenage flotsam out of crevices. Thats what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: More versatility in the next version please
customer_reviews.text: My only reason for not giving this a 5 star rating is it's lack of versatility. The silicone wiper is a soft rubber. It would be ideal to make the wiper interchangeable, so that the customer can change the wiper to harder rubber for more difficult to clean areas. I was able to remove the gunk in my Airpods (excuse the visual) with the wiper, but it would have been quicker and easier with a harder rubber.
customer_reviews.author: D E Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for cleaning electronic devices.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my gaming consoles and PC and it works well! The brush is very fine so it helps dusting off tight corners in my devices and its very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool!
customer_reviews.text: Does great on your keyboard. I ordered for my sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Oxo Good Grips has an amazing reputation and deservedly so. The price of electronics cleaning brush is great. I don't think the keyboard on my laptop has ever been as clean as it is now..... I'll definitely buy another, one for the laptop and one for the car.
customer_reviews.author: PB Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it’ll clean well but the hard edge is kind of soft and doesn’t do much, and the opposite side has some weak bristles that don’t much, can barely move dust with them.
customer_reviews.author: D&E0628

customer_reviews.title: Got this 4 months ago
customer_reviews.text: This still works pretty good, husband and I have been using it for 4 months now. Has held up. Great for cleaning. Has not fallen apart, which is nice considering how cheap it is. Seemed like a gimmick when I first saw it, but it really works. Would recommend to anyone who wants to have a clean keyboard, phone, electronic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keyboards!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased to clean my mechanical keyboard and it's wonderful! I've been wanting to pop off all the keys and really give the keyboard a deep clean. This product was perfect for that - really easy to use and clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, useful
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for me to clean up my desk at work. However I can't really get into nooks and crannies which disappoints me. I like keeping it in my backpack for a little quick cleaning. So it is convenient but not perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Execllent fiber brush for electronics and specimin cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Ergonomic design. OXO design is usually very good and this does NOT disappoint. Maybe we can get them to design more hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: RocketDoc

customer_reviews.title: Brush isn't great
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this after the good reviews. I was hoping to use the brush to whisk out bits of dust or crumbs between the keys on my laptop. But the brush is too wide and floppy - if it were thin and tapered, it would be much more useful. Also, the brush retractor didn't stay in place, so the brush kept sliding back down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for Airpod users
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for Airpod users. Airpods get clogged up with lint and become useless. This device allows you to clean them and Walla, you're ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime R. Carlo Casellas

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help my keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my keyboard with this one. I have a lot of dust in between the keys. It didn’t help at all...just kind of wiped over the dust and didn’t move it.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Product material did not feel cheap. Bristles easily got to dirt in between my electronic’s parts. The bristle control slide was smooth and is easy to use. Overall great product and haven’t run into any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jericho Ilagan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this very long but I'm happy with my purchase. I've been able to clean enough nooks and crannies in screens, keyboards and phones that it's already been worth it to me. If you like maintaining your electronics and such or want to clean out the cracks between sections of your dashboard easily and without damage, this is an excellent device for such things at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: ASM

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Was not as good as I thought it would be . Got this to clean my Mac in places where I couldn’t get to . I didn’t think it did that great a job.
customer_reviews.author: Review101

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I use this brush to clean computers and it works well. The brush will get in between keys on the keyboard without prying the keys off if you use normal care. It gets into the seams that collect dust and dirt also. I have even used the brush on the camera lens and microphone to clean off dust and it does a good job. I bought two--one for my computer-maintenance-toolbox and one for my desk. It can also be use on other things. OXO sells similar instruments for other devices and I have used it on car cleaning and detailing.
customer_reviews.author: Hike

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for what I intended it for, to clean the ports of my iPhone. The silicone just doesn’t grab anything. Tried using the silicone and brush top to clean the silence switch and it still looked the same after I was finished, not removing any dirt. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Mac Users
customer_reviews.text: I've had this brush since 2015. I use it almost daily to clean my MacBook Pro keyboard. Keeps the keyboard dust-free. The brush is still holding up and going strong. Great investment to keep your electronics clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksander A.

customer_reviews.title: I use this brush more than the others
customer_reviews.text: Irepair Xboxes and PlayStations this tool has helped a lot inside on the motherboard. And the heat sink areas Dam good tool
customer_reviews.author: David Kniss

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I carry this around in my computer bag all the time. Great to use to gently brush off dust or anything else off you screen and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Good for cleaning edges of screen protector, others parts of iPhone etc but isn’t able to clean charging port. Still give 5 stars because will come in handy for other cleaning tasks and isn’t marketed as a iPhone charging port cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: @ Road Dog Reviews on Youtube

customer_reviews.title: Cute little thing
customer_reviews.text: Brushing the cobwebs from my brain in the morning. I'm not going to submit reviews anymore if I am forced to write a bunch of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: bjm

customer_reviews.title: Does what is has to
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a way to keep my keyboard clean, it works fine, easily removes the hair and dust under the keys. The outer coat is somehow sticky what ends in dust a other particles being adhered to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. M. Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and a great price. Very useful for all kinds of things! Very glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.author: heinzilla

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for cleaning my electronics
customer_reviews.text: I am love with this electronics cleaning brush because I always get so irritated with smudges and dust on my electronics but always struggle to clean them and this makes is so much easier. Thanks OXO!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It's one thing to wipe off your keyboard and mouse, but it's quite another to have this nice little tool to get into the groves. Super helpful, and good quality for a low price. Couldn't ask for more. :)
customer_reviews.author: Candice K

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: When compressed air alone or those putty like cleaners aren’t enough - this works great. I’ve even gifted a few.
customer_reviews.author: GruvyGrl

customer_reviews.title: Tip not stiff enough, brush end is good though
customer_reviews.text: The rubber pointed tip is not stiff enough to scrape out those hard to reach edges...it just bends. However, the other brush end is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I use it to clean all the hard to reach places and even just to keep my charging port clear! I love it and it’s such a good material
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleaning brush. I use it on my personal vehicle for detailing and to dust out my computer and LED TV. It works great on delicate areas. It's very gentle on delicate areas and will not mark or scratch any soft delicate surfaces. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love the product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the product. As good as was advertised. Delivery was prompt and well-packaged. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning your laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleaning brush to keep my laptop clean, and I use it almost daily. It is easy to use, and within 2 minutes, my keyboard is clean from dust. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time to clean phone and key board at work which is shared by night and day shift ugh!!! and yuk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellys mama

customer_reviews.title: GETS MY KEYBOARD, REMOTES, MOUSE, ETC. SPIFFY!
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR ONLY USING THE BRUSH BUT WHAT A DIFFERENCE THIS MAKES. I WILL FURTHER EXPLORE WITH THIS DANDY TOOL AND REPORT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: MAGICARPET

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, and I'm glad I got it on discount. Otherwise, I would not have purchased. The tip is bendable but doesn't not really clean between the keys well.
customer_reviews.author: Superbizmom

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I thought it was an electronic brush that would vibrate or blow air in between the keys on a keyboard but there is nothing electronic about it. That being said it works very well. The brush is the perfect length to get things out from between the keys on a standard desktop keyboard and the rubber tip picks up the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Henicle

customer_reviews.title: and boy was it disgusting. The brush has certainly held up
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest little gadget. I bought it for my mother who is obsessed with clearing naked to the (average person's) eye crumbs on her keyboard. I've used it to clean my own, and boy was it disgusting. The brush has certainly held up. Whoever thinks of these things, hats off to you. Gone are the days of q-tips and rubbing alcohol or freezing my hands on cans of compressed air.
customer_reviews.author: Renee
